bibl.title: Fractions of Houses in Ptolemaic Hawara.
Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007
bibl.author: MUHS, Brian

bibl.note: The Ptolemaic Hawara papyri suggest that the Egyptians took deliberate measures to minimize the creation of inconvenient or impractical physical fractions of houses as a result of inheritance.
MUHS Brian, Fractions of Houses in Ptolemaic Hawara.

Sandra LIPPERT and Maren SCHENTULEIT (Edd.), Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007 (Wiesbaden, 2008) pp. 187-197, 2 arbres généal.
